website_summaries.verdict: Despite a capable, high-quality touch screen and iPad Pro-like looks, the Huawei MateBook E doesn't measure up to many competing detachable 2-in-1s.

customer_reviews.title: Great initial impressions meets Glitch in my Unit
customer_reviews.text: I was very enthusiastic about the form factor of this device. The screen is quite nice, but the glitches and issues I've had with my unit have forced me to return it after only light usage. I've had issues in particular with the finger print reader, wifi stability (on multiple networks), and a weird black screen limbo when restarting and sometimes when powering on. Its hard to generalize if these issues are particular to my unit or this model in general, but do take this as a data point in making your purchase decision.
customer_reviews.author: Dbur1000Top Contributor: Fountain Pens

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Is not always that I stop to write a review. I just came to say that this equipment is brilliant if you know what you are buying and what are you paying for. Portability: excellent. Appearence: great! Battery: sucks. But, again: if you are replacing those bulky laptops to carry something light, specially if you are buying it for a student which is already carrying a heavy backpack with books and is supposed to use the computer mostly in a indoor environment with wifi and AC outlets available around, I am pretty sure this is the best choice you can make with 500 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product. Replaced my laptop
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Replaced my laptop, tablet and kindle. Two months in and working well, BUT, this morning the charger stopped working, a real disappointment given that very few generic USB chargers will work with the device and my local Huawei agent has no stock!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible support from Huawei. Avoid!
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is terrible. The fingerprint sensor is basically useless. No matter how many times you register your fingerprint it only works one or two times. Although the screen is good, the brightness is poor. There is only one type c port for everything you need. The WORST: the flex in my keyboard is broken and I tried to contact Huawei many times and not a single one I got a response. Now I have a $630 paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Alberto

customer_reviews.title: Need stylus, don't buy this one !!
customer_reviews.text: Almost impossible to find stylus and accessories. I would not recommend it. Also, impossible to have it work with any other stylus.
customer_reviews.author: Avinash R Sharma

customer_reviews.title: not much of an upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this, unfortunately it has the same crappy battery life as last years model. I thought this was supposed to come with the matedock and pen for the price it should have. Not enough of an upgrade might just return it.
customer_reviews.author: SEAN STEPHEN BALO

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop for Everday Usage
customer_reviews.text: This laptop/tablet combination is ideal for consumers who are looking for a secondary or daily usage device. It has a terrific display and I like it includes the keyboard. It's extremely lightweight, hardly noticeable in a backpack. However, I believe the processing speed is on the slower side and battery life should be improved; I average around 8 to 9 hrs on this device. Wish it had at least another USB-C port, though this lack a ports is partially compensated for including a USB-C to USB adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Nice device
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact device, perhaps a little pricey for what it offers in terms of brute strength but for everyday office use it's great. Decent battery, screen big enough to do excel work comfortably and the option to use it as a tablet after work. Good sold case that feels premium. Good work by Huawei overall
customer_reviews.author: Amr247

customer_reviews.title: Really nice Tablet / Laptop replacement
customer_reviews.text: Really nice Tablet / Laptop replacement, the only cons is that it only have 1 USB-C port! I think we need at least 2 of them: 1 for USB HUB and another one for charging. It bootend up to setup and after 30 minutes I was running Windows did not have problems at all. I love the portability AND gorgeous screen!
customer_reviews.author: M. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to take windows on the go
customer_reviews.text: Not the fastest windows device I've owned. But that's was expected. It's my 2nd day of owning this and so far I have not put it down. Runs windows 10 smoothly. At idle windows is using a little more than 50% of the ram and 15% of the CPU. I've had no problem running daily tasks. Browsing the internet checking email watching Netflix Hulu and so forth. Mine is the Matbook E series m3 CPU with 4gigs of ram. Only 4 stars since it has no SD card slot. Perfect to take windows on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: premium feel and meets my expectations but the folio keyboard ...
customer_reviews.text: premium feel and meets my expectations but the folio keyboard touchpad isn't working. not sure what the problem is. all drivers are up to date the keyboard works but touch pad is faulty. probably a detective folio keyboard. UPDATE: i downloaded and installed the keyboard firmware from the manufacturer's website and the touchpad is responding. i guess the folio keyboard was preinstalled with a bad firmware.
customer_reviews.author: F-Lan

customer_reviews.title: a very small usb c charger which is also good to charge my cell fone
customer_reviews.text: What I think is one of the most important feature of this device is its power brick, and I saw nobody commenting this, any road warrior wants the lghtest and the simplest gear and this huawei got it, a very small usb c charger which is also good to charge my cell fone, gone are the days with more than one heavy charges!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy for travel and serves the purpose of a tablet ...
customer_reviews.text: The 2 in 1 was exactly what I was looking for, easy for travel and serves the purpose of a tablet in meetings and can operate as a computer when I'm doing work in the evening. Keyboard works great, the only issue is battery life is not as strong as expected. Overall a great purchase and I highly recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Melago

customer_reviews.title: Great 2 in 1! Good price, great to use!
customer_reviews.text: Another amazing product from Huawei. I already own a Mate 9, which is a killer phone, so decided to get a 2-in-1 from them. Love it! It comes with the keyboard, so I do not need to spend extra $$ to get one. The 2k touchscreen is both beautiful and easy to use. Also, appreciate that it comes with Office 365 free for a year, saving me some money. I use it for work and play, and it handles both amazingly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: light and beautiful laptop, I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: this is a very smooth, light and beautiful laptop,I like it very much, but I have a suggestion, it should have a bigger dock,because only one 3.0 usb port is not enough
customer_reviews.author: daijun qiang

customer_reviews.title: Fast with M3 , don't know why without docking.
customer_reviews.text: Very good, can't expect fast cos it's M3. But, it's fast for me. Battery just Okay, around 5-6 hours. Like surface with better mon and lighter. Only Type-C may not be very well.
customer_reviews.author: Bbbrrri

customer_reviews.title: i5+8gb
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised! Feels high quality. Read other reviews complaining about the keyboard and touchpad. Only complaint is just the adjustment to learning where the keys are at. Touchpad is responsive however not great for super accuracy. Battery life has been non-issue to me. Charges quickly. Got a great deal for the i5+8gb.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Prentice

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for students.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1. Value for money. 2/3rd the price of Surface Pro with similar specs. 2. Display is absolutely gorgeous. 3. Incredibly slim and light-weight. 4. 100/100 on portability. 5. Detachable cover is cool. 6. Top end specs. Cons: 1. No adapter included (atleast for me) and also no stylus. 2. Battery life is average. Does the work though. 3. Keyboard and touchpad quality could be improved. Discoloration in white keyboard after half a year. Overall: Pros far outweigh the cons and would recommend this product to anyone looking for an affordable and portable 2-in-1 without compromising on processing power.
customer_reviews.author: Shubham Chauhan

customer_reviews.title: Only one camera
customer_reviews.text: Good but has only one camera (at front) It is strange because is a tablet too!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good 2-1 laptop: 1. i5 7 generation + 8gb + 256 gb

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the worse present someone has ever given to me
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the worse present someone has ever given to me. Turned this thing ON for the first time and took a century to get to the main screen. It has a lot of glitches. Takes forever to access any webpage even though I have the fastest internet speed and great wireless network. Most of the time it tells you that it cannot access the webpage when I'm trying to go to google.com :/. Do not waste your time and money on this device.
